attributes.action: Change people being able to drop out of house sales after acceptance of offer
attributes.additional_details: I was in the process of selling and buying a property. We were due to exchange in a weeks time when the person at the bottom of a small chain pulled out causing the whole chain to break. Due to this happening many people are left out of pocket as have paid for things such as searches.
attributes.background: The law to be changed to ensure once an offer is accepted you cannot pull out of a house sale.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634121
